website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for a double spoon rest will find their match in this highly rated option.
pros: Offered in different designs and styles, and can also be purchased as a single spoon rest
Melamine less breakable than other materials like glass or porcelain
cons: Some owners were disappointed by the 'hard plastic' feel given by the melamine

customer_reviews.title: this item is plastic, not Corelle glass material
customer_reviews.text: This item was not made by Corelle. It is not the glass Corelle type of material that the plates and bowls are form out of. It is a molded piece of plastic with a decal embossed onto it. It can not be used on a stop top close to a flame or an electric range with a hot element or it will melt and deform quickly. This should have been clearly noted in the on line sales description.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Very nice melamine (or something similar) spoon rest. But I wish the bowl part wasn't so deep - the way it's designed, there's no room for a couple of spoons to share the space, it's just one at a time. Next time I'll look for shallower edges in a spoon rest, a wider stem part, and possibly one with double wells.
customer_reviews.author: lotsamice

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WAIST YOUR. MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This is like a toy for a child. It will not hold any cooking utensils unless you lay it cross ways
customer_reviews.author: Lady "J"

customer_reviews.title: Ivy Spoon Rest
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful match the any ivy pattern. Sturdy and easy to clean. Helps make cooking easier and wastes less paper towel or having to clean extra kitchen towels.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: It's plastic
customer_reviews.text: was very disappointed to see this was plastic and NOT real corelle.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Spoon Rest
customer_reviews.text: This spoon rest is melamine so it won't break like glass. One of the best features is the depth; great for big spoons. I selected this item for my French Country Kitchen and the color is perfect. I wouldn't recommend using it in the dishwasher unless it's on the top rack only. Nevertheless, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Philly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Completely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 11 years now, it still looks like the day I bought it. Absolutely love that it goes in the dishwasher as well!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Wowww! Sooo inlove with this. I collect all country cottage (Corelle) and this one is just adorable. Durable and pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Erla Agustin

customer_reviews.title: cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I got this to match the country cottage set of plates I bought. It's super cute and functional, deep enough to hold a cooking spoon without getting sauces everywhere. It looks really nice in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenhair

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, although it's more plastic than ceramic which I was not expecting, but I admit that could be my fault for not reading the description well enough. I actually hung it as a decoration in my kitchen as opposed to using it as a spoon rest and it's very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I needed a double spoon rest. This fit the bill. It is lighter than expected. It is made of a plastic that is dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product...
customer_reviews.text: ...but why do I need it? I bought it just because it matches my dinnerware.
customer_reviews.author: dkeephus

customer_reviews.title: Very trendy looking
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited to have everything match in the kitchen. From my dinnerware, to glasses and now the spoon holder! It seems pretty durable, but I just received them yesterday and haven't had a good chance to give it a try. But for the price, if it lasts a year, I have gotten my money's worth! I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and matches the dinnerware
customer_reviews.text: It was lighter than I expected, also thought it being Corelle it would have been glass, guess I need to read the description better.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Poole

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and I am happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go with my decor. Nicely made and I am happy with this purchase. The cup part is deep which is good for bigger spoons
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking plastic
customer_reviews.text: Not Correlle ceramic, but plastic. So far, cleans and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Nice pattern
customer_reviews.text: I have used Corelle for years. I really like this pattern and the size of these spoon rests. Packaged well, arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: J Boddy

customer_reviews.title: Spoon Rest
customer_reviews.text: This item is used daily. I use it for all of the above.
customer_reviews.author: Jane B. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: I like it except for one critical thing... it is really too big to keep on my stove top
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, it matches my Corelle set, but it is HUGE. I placed it between my two back burners, and there is like half an inch clearance on either side. I'd be afraid to use the back burners without removing it from the stove first (note, it is plastic, not Corelle "material") for fear of it melting. It is fairly solid for plastic, seems easy to clean, and it does serve its purpose... I just wish it was a bit smaller!
customer_reviews.author: S. Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive in the kitchen and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: It is attractive and durable. Easy to clean! Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Picarelli

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this--since it's for 2 spoons. It's a little larger than I expected and doesn't fit between my burners (that's why I didn't give it 5 starts) but very pretty and useful. It washes well too. It measures 8.2" x 8/4" x 1". It's not a cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Nei

customer_reviews.title: Goes perfect with my teapot.
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much just wish it was a little more flatter for big spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have broken so many spoon rest so I loved finding this plastic one. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: 2 Old Texan's

customer_reviews.title: It's a great addition.
customer_reviews.text: It serves it's purpose and goes with my Corelle Coordinates plates and cups.
customer_reviews.author: Sassysass71

customer_reviews.title: ... anxiously waiting for this item but I was totally disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was anxiously waiting for this item but I was totally disappointed with this product. I found that this product isn't correlle. It turned out to be plastic. Probably it might be of good quality plastic but I wanted was a real correlle product to Match my dinner ware. Thanks to Amazon for understanding my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Exuberant

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for my cooking needs
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for my cooking needs; I was so impressed with the quality that I also purchased the accompanying pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Saundra L

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Matches the set of dishes and storage containers I bought. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyne

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, great size for stovetop. Design very durable after many trips through dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Gardenbroad

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's a little small but it's a nice design for those rooster lovers.
customer_reviews.author: pamela furst

customer_reviews.title: Double Spoon Rest
customer_reviews.text: This is nice for it is large for two spoons, not made for the middle of the stove, however, I like cooking to the side of my pots for safety purposes. Cleans easily in dishwasher or a swipe of a damp soapy dish cloth. Design is beautiful with matching coordinates one can buy if one likes.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Very good piece
customer_reviews.text: This added well to our bamboo leaf dish set as well as our completer set. This is not corelle glass as you know it, but rather a molded melamine as far as I can tell. The quality seems great, but I will review after a few years to see how the quality looks then. Hopefully I will be as pleased as I am now.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Berberette

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice enough spoon rest, didn’t realize that it was on the smaller side in size!
customer_reviews.author: G STANLEY

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: It looks fine but it's just cheap plastic and I feel it's very overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh R. F. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: was happy to be able to match my set w/ a ...
customer_reviews.text: Matches the Corelle Bamboo plate sets I purchased, was happy to be able to match my set w/ a double spoon rest, we do a lot of cooking! Durable, and dishwasher friendly. Holding up as a Corelle product is expected to.
customer_reviews.author: Orcinus81

customer_reviews.title: Happy I'm able to have full set
customer_reviews.text: Ordered complete set of Corelle Splendor. Happy I'm able to have full set!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Baros

customer_reviews.title: Nice, solid and simple
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to replace an amalgamation of dishes over the years. Wanted something to go in the microwave or oven and stand the test of grandchildren. So far they have done the job. Should note that in the microwave they do get hot so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Battledad

customer_reviews.title: LOVELY!
customer_reviews.text: This does feel more plastic than the material the seller says its made out of. I had smooth shipping! No delays or broken pieces(surprise!!) This is totally cute in person. Looks just like it does in the pictures! No reason you shouldn't buy this item. Its cheap and cute! I am MORE than positive that it will do its intended job.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Banks

customer_reviews.title: bought as a gift and it is great. I may be ordering one soon for myself
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift and it is great. I may be ordering one soon for myself, and keep it in mind for other gifts, If the price stays reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K Carlson

customer_reviews.title: It's great just don't run it in the dishwasher all the time
customer_reviews.text: This held up a lot longer than I thought it would. I think it would have lasted a lot longer if I had not ran it in the dishwasher with the dinner dishes. It became porous and the handle broke off. But I'm still using it!
customer_reviews.author: Trena Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool to have
customer_reviews.text: I do like this spoon rest but the original one I had was more elongated and made of ceramic or porcelain...this one is no where near as sturdy as the original but still very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mokie Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but it burns.
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice on the stove, until it burns by being too close to the element. It looked ceramic to me when I was ordering it. It would be awesome if it were ceramic so I could use it in the middle of the stove. I would either use this spoon rest on a side counter near the stove but away from the elements, or get a ceramic spoon rest.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little large for my taste, but a welcomed addition to the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Practical
customer_reviews.text: This spoon rest is nice and deep and matches my Corelle dinnerware perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Fran B

customer_reviews.title: Large and perfect to go with pattern
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to this pattern of Corelle. It is a large spoon rest that barely fits between my two back burners while I am not cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Christyann

customer_reviews.title: Spoon rest
customer_reviews.text: Again we have a rooster kitchen, and my husband has been wanting a spoon rest for all his yummy cooking, so he would not have to sit whatever he is using on! He was happy to see this had a rooster on it too, he uses it all the time. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ladyrider

customer_reviews.title: melamine Spoon Rest
customer_reviews.text: this spoon rest is okay, but not as colorful as I had hoped, It will be a welcome addition to the collection, tho' .The rooster is a mild, pleasant color, Reminds one of soft summer mornings& is pleasant enough to improve one's mood on gloomy mornings in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: LoriD

customer_reviews.title: Light, strong and classy spoon rest.
customer_reviews.text: Seemingly unbreakable, this spoon rest is light, classy, and so very convenient. We often have more than one utensil in use at a time. This double spoon rest is perfect for our stove top. The best we ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Leo R. Therrien

customer_reviews.title: one spoon rest area would have worked better for me
customer_reviews.text: its too big to fit in between my burners. so i'm not using it currently. one spoon rest area would have worked better for me.
customer_reviews.author: jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time and is part of a set- works and looks great
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM DIETRICH

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking plastic
customer_reviews.text: I sold it on ebay....looked so cheap that it had to go.
customer_reviews.author: MommaD

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a simple addition to the kitchen that made a great difference. It's effective for various types of kitchen utensils and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya T.

customer_reviews.title: Great  double spoon rest.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Looks nice on my black flat stove top. With all the black on the stove this brightens it up and the 2 spoon capacity is just what I need. Sturdy, light, doesn't stain and washes up well.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Very cute kitchen accessory
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. I was very pleased with this purchase. The only thing that would make it even better is if it were ceramic rather than melamine.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cass

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as pictured - cute!
customer_reviews.text: It is as cute as I hoped! The pattern is shrunk to fit inside the spoon, well made, and looks very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Tebault

customer_reviews.title: IT HELPS FINISH OUT A SET.
customer_reviews.text: IT DOES EVERYTHING IS SUPPOSE TO AND MORE!!! IT DOES EVERYTHING IS SUPPOSE TO AND MORE!!! IT DOES EVERYTHING IS SUPPOSE TO AND MORE!!! IT DOES EVERYTHING IS SUPPOSE TO AND MORE!!!
customer_reviews.author: FREDERICK C. TIMMEL

customer_reviews.title: Igly
customer_reviews.text: Again not white doesn't match dihed see the above information for correlleware I would rather have the white but they don't make the assessories anymore

customer_reviews.title: Clever, cute, coordinates with Corelle designs
customer_reviews.text: Neat, easy to clean surface. Two spoon rests for the cost of one. Problem solver for me.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic spoon rest that's nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I received this spoonrest as a free gift. The only advantage I can see about it is that it matches the other Corelle items in the Pink Trio pattern. If I had to buy one, I would opt for one in glass or pottery so I could be certain it wouldn't melt!
customer_reviews.author: M. Heeren

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design and if it slips, it will not break.
customer_reviews.author: Camelot's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Item was received defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this spoon rest with the coordinating burner covers. I had to return everything. The spoon rest had a stain by the flowers. One of the large burner covers had a stain as well. I don't recommend these items based on both being damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Made of plastic. Had a picture of flowers instead of chickens.

customer_reviews.title: Scetchy and not true USA Correlle
customer_reviews.text: Picture upside down. Cute but not true USA Correlle, plastic and made in China.

customer_reviews.title: spoon holder
customer_reviews.text: I needed extra spoon holders because one just won't do when your into different pots. This a deep one spoon or fork does good.

customer_reviews.title: Spoon rest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice comes in handy, hold the spoons well and cleans off easy.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the double spoon rest that is not breakable and dishwasher safe. Good quality, serves it's purpose nicely and looks great on the counter top.

customer_reviews.title: NOT IMPRESSED!
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, but if I Knew how it felt I wouldn't bought it. not happy with the material because it feels cheap like the plastic tea set that I had when I was a kid. I like better the material in the traditional spoon rest. one thing I like about it is the Rooster's painting.
customer_reviews.author: Annabd

customer_reviews.title: spoon rest
customer_reviews.text: Thought this product would be more like the dishes. Not at all looks really cheap. Put it in the drawer probably never will you it.

customer_reviews.title: Decorative, useful and needed.
customer_reviews.text: This item is decorative, useful and needed. Well designed, it holds a large variety of spoons and utensils. Convenient hanger hole is nice for when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Snoozer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, adds a pretty touch to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price, and the fact that the spoonrest is dishwasher safe. I was worried the pretty pattern would be worn off, but it looks the same after many washings. Very durable, easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen is blue and white with a chicken theme and this is the perfect spoon rest for it! It's going to be gracing my countertop for a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a big fan of Corelle. Fits perfectly with the theme in my kitchen! Had a hard time finding Country Cottage, but was lucky enough to find it on Amazon.com!

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Spatulas and larger spoons do not balance well on it, works well for table size spoons and forks. I will need to find one that will hold a spatula.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my mom and she loves it!!!! It is very well made and the design is so cute

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pattern and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my stove. Pretty pattern and easy to clean.

customer_reviews.text: Compliments all my other Corelle coordinates very well and is very useful in the kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: Would have given it 5 stars but for the fact ...

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too big for our stove.  Use it on the counter.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I thought and doesn't fit on the stove/oven but my wife loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Wish it wasn't plastic

customer_reviews.text: Cute, good size, holds spoons securely. Nice design, cute rooster picture, sturdy. Looks great with my kitchen chicken decor. Good purchase and great price.

customer_reviews.title: It will do but...
customer_reviews.text: There is a big green mark (looks like with permanent marker) on the bottom. If I weren't giving this as a gift it wouldn't matter since you can't see it unless you pick it up...but now I've got to figure out a way to make the big green mark okay. The shipping was okay, but the green line wasn't in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Bee

customer_reviews.title: Rooster Spoon Rest
customer_reviews.text: This was really cute and a nice size for an average wooden spoon, but too small for a ladle or anything bigger

customer_reviews.title: An excellent buy. The design is simple but appealing and ...
customer_reviews.text: An excellent buy. The design is simple but appealing and yet it is sturdy. Goes great with the Corelle electric range coordinates.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoon rest

customer_reviews.text: Love it. Goes in my Kitchen very well with all the other chicken items I have. Bye Bye for now

product_meta.title: Corelle Coordinates by Reston Lloyd Melamine Double Spoon Rest, Simple Lines
product_meta.description: Color:Simple Lines| Style Name:DoubleReston Lloyd produces high quality enamel on steel kitchen, melamine, and acrylic accessories to produce Corelle Coordinates as well as their private brand Calypso Basics. In addition, Reston Lloyd is the exclusive distributor for both Romertopf and MAWA which are home & kitchen products from Germany. These high end quality products are one of the corner stones to Reston Lloyd, who focus on quality merchandise from Germany. For nearly 30 years, we have been dedicated to providing the highest quality products, with an equal emphasis on superior customer service. The Corelle Coordinates by Reston Lloyd spoon rest is a place to rest or sit your utensils while you are working in the kitchen, keeping your counter or stovetop clean. A larger size covers and protects more of the counter, double spoon rest measures 8 1/4" long by 8 1/4" wide. Just rinse or put in the dishwasher to clean. Leave it on your counter to add a touch of color to your stove. Made of durable BPA free melamine. The spoon rest features the popular Corelle pattern Simple Lines to enhance your kitchen decor and match your dishware.
feature_bullets: Large spoon rest to keep counters clean and free of mess; measures 8 1/4 by 8 1/4-inch
Use for laying down spoons, brushes and utensils while cooking or serving to keep table and counter clean
Made of durable melamine; BPA free; can hold multiple utensils
Pattern compliments Corelle pattern Simple Lines to match Corelle dishes and kitchen décor
Easy clean; rinse or put in dishwasher

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars629 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
